title: Power Players: Defenders
description: Power Players: Defenders is a match-3 arcade game where you must assist Axel in his one-on-one combat against the invaders by employing your match-3 abilities. Madcap is attempting to seize control of the city using a vast number of evil toys, and it's your responsibility to put an end to his plan! Unlock additional characters and upgrade their abilities to confront numerous adversaries. Can you rise to the challenge and rescue the city?
